messages.content: Do you need police, fire, or medic?
Is that a house or a business?
What's the name of the business?
Why do you think it's being robbed?
My girlfriend works there. She called me and hung up abruptly, and I can hear her yelling in the background.
Danielle Watson. She gets off at nine and should have been home hours ago. It sounded like there was some type of commotion in the background when she called.
Okay, I'll go ahead and enter a call to have an officer out there and check it out. What's your name, sir?
We'll give you a call back when we find out what's going on. Thank you very much.
